name: Fairy Fun Math
description:
How to Play:

Step 1: Choose your difficulty.

Step 2: If you chose easy or medium, use the slider to select the correct answer to the question. If you chose hard or insane, manually enter the number in the space provided. When you are ready, tap the submit button.

Step 3: Challenge yourself to get the highest score possible. You have 3 lives.

Game Description:

Fairy Fun Math features a fast paced, flash card inspired environment for players to engage their mind and soul.

Get lost in the fanciful world of math while you compete for your own personal best high score. (No Cheating!) 

With levels ranging from easy to insane, Fairy Fun Math is fun, and challenging for the whole family. 

Put the violence and chaos aside for a moment and enjoy a refreshing breath of fresh air as you enter the world of Fairy Fun Math. 

Find yourself addicted to the sounds of success as you magically train your brain to be all it can be. 

Fairy Fun Math is part of the missing link between education and gamification. It's kind of like an arcade that actually makes you smarter. 

Should we really limit our screen time when we have access to games like this?
